jcolibri.cbrcore
Interface CBRTerm

All Known Subinterfaces:
CBRCase, CBRCaseBase, CBRQuery
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicCBRCaseBase, BasicIEMethod, CaseEvalList, CaseEvaluation, CasesIRMethod, CaseStAttribute, CaseStComponent, CaseStCompoundAtt, CaseStDescription, CaseStResult, CaseStructure, CaseStSimpleAtt, CaseStSimpleAttConcept, CaseStSolution, CBRCaseJena, CBRCaseRecord, CBRGenericQuery, CBRGlobalSimilarity, CBRLocalSimilarity, CBRMethod, CBRMethod, CBRSimilarity, CBRSystemMethod, CBRTask, CBRWebMethod, CloseConnectorMethod, CombineQueryAndCasesMethod, ConfigureDLQueryMethod, ConfigureQueryMethod, CopyCasesforAdaptationMethod, DirectCopyMethod, DLAdaptationMethod, DomainTopicClassifierMethod, ExtractFeaturesMethod, ExtractNamesMethod, ExtractPhrasesMethod, GlossaryRelationsMethod, KeywordLayerMethod, LoadCaseBaseMethod, LoadDLCaseBaseMethod, ManualRevisionMethod, NumericDirectProportionMethod, NumericSimComputationMethod, ObtainWebQueryMethod, PartofSpeechMethod, PostCycleMethod, PreCycleMethod, RetainChooserMethod, RetainComputationalMethod, RetrieveComputationalForWebServerMethod, RetrieveComputationalMethod, RetrieveTextualCasesMethod, ReuseComputationalMethod, SelectAllCasesMethod, SelectBestCaseMethod, SelectSomeCasesMethod, SendCasesToWebServerMethod, SetupTextualCasesMethod, SkipThisTaskMethod, StartTomcatMethod, StartWebCycleMethod, StemmerMethod, StopTomcatMethod, StopWebCycleMethod, StoreCasesMethod, TextRelationsMethod, TextualCBRPreProcessMethod, TextualCBRRetrieveMethod, TextualPreCycleMethod, WebPostCycleMethod, WebPreCycleMethod, WordNetRelationsMethod, WordsFilterMethod
public interface CBRTerm

Root of the CBR ontology declared over JColibrí, currently is just a mark interface that all members of the ontolgy will specialize directly or through some inheritance
